author: arkurth
msg: Added Windows_mod.pm::disable_ie_configuration_page(). This configures the registry to prevent the initial IE configuration page from appearing for users. Added a call to this sub in pre_capture().
Also removed call to allow_remote_access() in firewall_enable_rdp() and added a call to it in pre_capture(). This speeds up the tasks that occur after a user clicks the Connect button.

author: ceki
msg: removed reference to parent pom, corrected value of name element

author: odeakin
msg: UnsupportedEncodingException should never occur for UTF-8, so throw AssertionError containing the original chained exceptions.

author: vkumar
msg: Checking if Maximize window is layout itself

author: odeakin
msg: Ensure test data is not converted to the native character set when creating the String from the original byte array.
